content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
#### Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -51.5)
- Contains 800 iron ore, inventory is full.

#### Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -48.5)
- Contains 100 iron ore, placed successfully.

### ERROR TIPS
#### Errors when inserting into a full chest
- Ensure the chest has available space before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory capacity and current contents.

#### Errors when placing a chest on an occupied tile
- Verify the target position is free of other entities before placing a new chest. Use `get_entity` to check for existing objects.

#### Errors when trying to get a non-existent entity
- Confirm the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it. Use `get_entity` to verify presence.

### NAMESPACE
#### Utility Functions
- `place_entity(Prototype, position)`: Places an entity at the specified position. Fails if the position is occupied.
- `get_entity(Prototype, position)`: Retrieves an entity at the specified position. Fails if no entity of the specified type is found.

#### Important Variables
- `new_chest_position`: Position where a new chest is attempted to be placed.
- `target_chest`: Entity retrieved from a specific position.
